name: Power User AI Researcher
description: Deep AI/ML specialist with 90%+ specialization in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and frontier research. Prefers long-form technical deep dives from researchers and practitioners. Primary interest in model architectures, training methodologies, scaling laws, and inference optimization. Occasional cross-disciplinary curiosity in AI's intersection with defense, robotics, and biotech. Heavy engagement with Latent Space, No Priors, and AI + a16z content. Tests whether algorithm maintains relevance with extensive history.
expected_behavior: Top 10 should be dominated by AI/ML technical content
Latent Space, No Priors, AI + a16z should rank highly
High similarity scores (>0.7) due to focused interests
Occasional defense-tech or biotech content acceptable as cross-disciplinary
Should NOT surface crypto, macro, or general VC content
Bookmarked episodes should have outsized influence on recommendations
